text: Allakh - vash Tvorets - (o lyudi!) znayet luchshe vas mysli i chuvstva, kotoryye tayatsya v vashikh dushakh, i daruyet vam nagradu ili nakazhet vas po vashim deyaniyam. Yesli vy stremites' k dobru i vershite yego, no sovershili malen'kiy grekh, a zatem obratilis' k Allakhu, raskaivayas', Allakh prostit vas. Poistine, Allakh - khvala Yemu! - proshchayet tekh, kto obrashchayetsya k Nemu, kayas' v svoikh grekhakh
